it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.analyzer

Class Sniffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.analyzer.Sniffer

  • public class Sniffer
extends java.lang.Object
    It captures packets on one or more network interfaces.

    For each capture packet the method SnifferListener.onPacket(Sniffer, NetInterface, Packet) is called.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sniffer(NetInterface[] net_interfaces, SnifferListener listener)
      Creates a packet sniffer.
      Sniffer(NetInterface net_interface, SnifferListener listener)
      Creates a packet sniffer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Closes the sniffer.

      • Sniffer

        public Sniffer(NetInterface net_interface,
               SnifferListener listener)
        Creates a packet sniffer. The sniffer is attached to a network interface.
